thread.title: New X-Files trailer means it's a doubly big day for sci-fi fans
thread.title_full: New X-Files trailer means it's a doubly big day for sci-fi fans

title: New X-Files trailer means it's a doubly big day for sci-fi fans
text:
New X-Files trailer means it's a doubly big day for sci-fi fans New X-Files trailer means it's a doubly big day for sci-fi fans 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
First we got a glimpse at the new Star Wars film and now, in the same day, we have been treated to a look at the X Files’ forthcoming revival. 
This might prove too much for sci-fi fans to handle. 
Here is the 30-second preview gifted to us by Fox. 
The supernatural thriller has been away from TV for more than a decade, after clocking up 202 episodes across nine series. 
Special Agents Mulder and Scully will return for the miniseries in January 2016. 
As you might imagine, people couldn’t quite deal with the excitement. New Star Wars, new X-Files … if we could just discover a new Beatles album, then all my teenage obsessive phases would be covered.
